story-moment.BATTLING WITH THE AVENGERS: During the Avengers' first battle as a team, the Hulk was a crucial element, helping fight off an invading Chitauri army and showing Loki why he was a “puny god.”
story-moment.RELATIONSHIP WITH NATASHA ROMANOFF: Bruce Banner and his teammate Natasha Romanoff, the Black Widow, considered a relationship, but as the Hulk, he decided to leave as the battle against Ultron waned.
story-moment.FRIENDS FROM WORK: On Sakaar, the Hulk became champion in the Grandmaster’s Contest of Champions, only to face Thor in the arena.
story-moment.LOSING TO THANOS: Following a loss to Thanos, the Hulk refused to manifest, even as Banner attempted to bring him forth when Thanos’ followers arrived in New York.

powers+abilities.SUPERHUMAN STRENGTH: The Hulk’s strength is immense, allowing him to stop foes even bigger than he is with a single blow, to throw massively heavy objects, and to tear apart metal as though it were paper.
powers+abilities.LONG DISTANCE JUMPING: The Hulk’s leg muscles are strong enough to allow him to leap great distances in a short period of time.
powers+abilities.HULK SMASH: Slamming his hands together, the Hulk can create a massive concussive wave.
powers+abilities.DURABILITY AND REGENERATION: The Hulk’s skin is able to withstand a tremendous amount of injury and he is able to heal far quicker than a normal human when harmed.
powers+abilities.GENIUS INTELLIGENCE: Bruce Banner is among Earth’s most brilliant men, leading to remarkable (if not always positive) creations like Ultron alongside Tony Stark.
